CVE-2023-36584 (CVSS score: 5.4) - Microsoft Windows Mark-of-the-Web (MotW) Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2023-1671 (CVSS score: 9.8) -
articles.title: CISA Adds Three Security Flaws with Active Exploitation to KEV Catalog

articles.description:

articles.title: Zero-Day Flaw in Zimbra Email Software Exploited by Four Hacker Groups

articles.title: Experts Uncover DarkCasino: New Emerging APT Threat Exploiting WinRAR Flaw
